name: Commandos: Strike Force
description:
Commandos: Strike Force is an action-shooter game developed by Pyro Studios. It was originally released in 2006. Eidos Interactive published the game. Commandos: Strike Force has a Metascore of 60, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Commandos: Strike Force on PC, PlayStation 2 and Xbox.
It was produced by José Manuel García Franco.
